text: Tamagra Sata mofavre naga mani'naze, ana hunetma nermafa'ma avenesia avu'avaza nehaze. Ese agafare vahe ahe fri'nea ne' mani'neno, tamage nanekemofona amage nonte. Na'ankure tamage kea agripina omne'ne. Kema hifina, havigege nehie, agra avu'ava zanku kea nehie. Na'ankure havige ne' mani'neno, havigemofo nefa'e.
